Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: When my tutor gives really vague answers to my question that is of no help at all, Gen AI can sometimes help to push me in the correct direction when i ask the same question. And sometimes when i don't understand the content of my lecture, Gen AI helps to direct me to certain websites to learn, like how microsoft copilot references websites and links them.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: For feedback by my teacher, i feel that it is sometimes insufficient and sometimes vague, but this differs across different teachers. The same can be said some Gen AI. Some products like chatGPT is not useful while some like copilot or gemini is more insightful.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Gen AI cannot physically show you where to improve on your work and sometimes it may be incorrect. Teachers can read through and point out where it is lacking and provide advice.
